Package bt.protocol

Class Handshake

  • java.lang.Object
    • bt.protocol.Handshake
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Message

    public final class Handshake
extends Object
implements Message
    Standard handshake message. This is the very first message that peers must send, when initializing a new peer connection. Handshake message includes: - a constant header, specified in standard BitTorrent protocol - torrent ID - peer ID - 8 reserved bytes, that are used by extensions, e.g. BEP-10: Extension Protocol
    Since:
    1.0
